title: Integrated Mobile Microlearning Course on Engineering Technology and Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical math application skills for working professionals, optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners explain fundamental mathematical concepts (matrix operations, function graphs) required for image processing techniques (e.g., filter application, contrast adjustment) with over 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate the mathematical modeling process by analyzing real-world engineering cases provided through a mobile app
Learners select appropriate mathematical formulas (FFT, convolution) to resolve issues encountered in image processing tasks (e.g., noise reduction)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
